title: Bobby To Tell His Therapist About New Girlfriend + Bobby Obsessed With ‘Cheer’ On Netflix + Chase Rice Talks About 'Bachelor' Episode With His Ex
itunes:title: Bobby To Tell His Therapist About New Girlfriend + Bobby Obsessed With ‘Cheer’ On Netflix + Chase Rice Talks About 'Bachelor' Episode With His Ex
description:
Bobby said his therapist is returning for the first time in 3 weeks. He is going to see her today and wondering how she is going to react when he tells her that he has a girlfriend now. Bobby recommends ‘Cheer’ on Netflix after he finished the first season. Chase Rice talks to us about being on the Bachelor last night and not knowing his ex would be one of the contestants.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
